operation.descriptionCdata:
fda8b68d-1373-47b0-9076-9e25fa478d50.description=
Service to retrieve JVM memory usage info (only 1.5 JVMs). 

Input Operators\: 
None

Responses\:
success - statistics retrieved successfully
non 1.5 jvm - jvm is not version 1.5
failure - general failure occurred

Extra Results\:
heapUsed - contains the amount of memory used (in bytes) in the heap
heapCommitted - amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use
heapInit - amount of memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management
heapMax - Returns the maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management
nonHeapUsed - contains the amount of memory used (in bytes)
nonHeapCommitted - amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use
nonHeapInit - amount of memory in bytes that the Java virtual machine initially requests from the operating system for memory management
nonHeapMax - Returns the maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management
operation.name: JVM Memory Usage Statistics

scriptlet.name: Operation JVM Memory Usage Statistics (fe480b7b-e361-409b-a02a-eb2048238e73)
